context: Matching two locators simultaneously​ | Method [locator.and()](/docs/api/class-locator#locator-and) narrows down an existing locator by matching an additional locator. For example, you can combine [page.getByRole()](/docs/api/class-page#page-get-by-role) and [page.getByTitle()](/docs/api/class-page#page-get-by-title) to match by both role and title.
